resources.string: Click on this button and you will go to the rules screen.
Click back to return to the previous screen.
Click on this button and you will go to the settings screen.
Move your finger along the progress of the Music bar to adjust the music.
Move your finger along the progress of the Sound bar to adjust the sound.
Click back to return to the previous screen.
Click on this button and you will go to the levels screen.
Levels with a lock icon are locked, they are unlocked if you pass the previous level.
Blue levels are unlocked, in the middle the number 1 is the level, at the bottom 0/100 - it means you need to score 100 points to unlock the next level.
Throw this ball at the elements around to score points, when you score 100 or more points, press the save button that will appear to save your score and go to the next level.
